title.label: Just make it hard as possible to report bug

content.label:
I have had Blitz & other King games for YRS.! Enjoy them as well; however, they make it almond st impossible to report problems or bugs in the games! 
I believe that customer service is very important, but have come to realize that they make it harder & harder, for their convenience, not for mine.
Good gosh, you‚Äôd think they would reward loyalty and honest play.
While playing Jewel Blitz, my screen looked frozen, however the time kept running‚Äôs for more than 12 seconds went locked & unplayable. I was playing for the daily chance to win, @ 10k a pop for the rare gems.
Thought maybe they would like to know, even restore my 10k.
However, after trying 3-4 times to report it; screen after screen came up to REENTER the same information! 
I knew before they had good games & do nothing t like to help, but silly me I tried again today to report...Only to find that customer service seemingly really does not matter!
Shame on them!
Play & have fun! Know this they don‚Äôt care about  your account or loyalty!
ALSO, for those that don‚Äôt know, you can play games for rare gems, but normally You must purchase the real ones!
May I not forget!
